short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically detects URLs, DOIs, PMIDs, PMCIDs, and ISBNs on webpages, and generates citations in your preferred style.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CiteEase is a lightweight Chrome extension designed for researchers, students, and professionals. It streamlines citation generation by automatically detecting URLs, DOIs, PMIDs, PMCIDs, and ISBNs on webpages and providing instant, properly formatted references.

Features:
1. Automatic Detection: Highlights citation-worthy elements like DOIs, PMIDs, and ISBNs on any webpage.
2. Inline Citation Tool: Quickly generate formatted citations with a single click using the "Cite" button next to highlighted elements.
3. Page-Level Citation: Generate citations for entire webpages directly from the extension popup.
